backend/main.mo: Actor implementing blob storage, access control, user profiles, and adminâ€‘restricted product CRUD operations.
backend/migration.mo: No-op migration module returning the previous actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend admin session, login, and product mutation files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, theme, query client, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Route guard that redirects unauthenticated admins and shows a loading spinner during checks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImagePicke: Image upload component handling validation, compression, preview, and conversion to ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog for creating and editing products with form fields, image picker, and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductTab: Admin table for listing, editing, and deleting products with dialogs and image fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/branding/Brandin: Hero section displaying brand logo, tagline, feature badges, and a large hero image.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing site branding and a credit link with a decorative heart icon.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with navigation links, mobile menu toggle, and admin login button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/products/Categor: Renders a titled product section with grid or empty-state message.
Tab-based category selector for filtering products by type.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product with image, price, category badge, and a WhatsApp order button.
Responsive grid layout rendering multiple ProductCard components.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminSession: Manages admin authentication state, login, and logout using URL session params and backend checks.
frontend/src/hooks/products/useProductMu: React Query mutations for creating, updating, and deleting products with admin validation and toasts.
Fetches all products from the backend using React Query when actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on authenticated identity and initializes access control.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and states using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard for managing products, including add dialog, product table, and logout.
Admin login form handling authentication, validation, and error display.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPanelPage.tsx: Displays a customer-facing product menu with category filtering and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductListingPage.ts: Renders a full categorized product listing with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/images.ts: Validates and compresses uploaded image files with size/type checks and canvas-based compression.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds a WhatsApp order URL containing product details.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a food ordering site, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of implemented features with IDs and versions.
